channel.title: Call for Tender - ToR for Needs Assessment for IATI Advisory Services for CSOs in Uganda
channel.description: Caritas Denmark is looking for a consultant for a need assessment regarding AITI advisory services for CSOs in Uganda. See attached ToR. Note the short deadline. For further information, contact Maj Forum: mfo@caritas.dk ToR for Needs Assessment for IATI Advisory Services among CSOs (with annexes).pdf (2.8 MB)

item.title: Call for Tender - ToR for Needs Assessment for IATI Advisory Services for CSOs in Uganda
item.dc:creator: mfo
item.description:
Caritas Denmark is looking for a consultant for a need assessment regarding AITI advisory services for CSOs in Uganda. See attached ToR. Note the short deadline. For further information, contact Maj Forum: mfo@caritas.dk

ToR for Needs Assessment for IATI Advisory Services among CSOs (with annexes).pdf (2.8 MB)

Read full topic
